title: Add KHMER TOOL BOT to Social_Bots
author: pollinations-ai[bot]

gist.headline: KHMER TOOL BOT joins the hive
gist.blurb: A new multi-purpose assistant has landed in the showcase. KHMER TOOL BOT brings utilities and Pollinations image generation directly to Telegram.
gist.summary: Added KHMER TOOL BOT, a Telegram utility with Pollinations image generation integration, to the community apps showcase.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and use this multi-purpose bot for Telegram tasks and creative generation.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee interacting with a blue paper plane (Telegram symbol). The plane is delivering a payload of pixelated tools and images. The setting is a cozy digital garden.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot catching a large blue paper plane (Telegram style) that is carrying pixelated tools and photos. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel blue gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Chunky sprites, emotionally warm.
